lyrics:
When the night falls down, I want you
DJ, please, take me away

DJ, please, take me away

And when the lights go down, I need you
DJ, please, take me away
I’ll take you away

When the night falls down, I want you
DJ, please, take me away
And when the lights go down, I need you
DJ, please, take me away
When the night falls down, I want you
DJ, please, take me away
And when the lights go down, I need you
DJ, please, take me away
I’ll take you away
Take me away
I’ll take you away
Take me away
Take me away
